name: ADPA - European Independent Automotive Data Publishers Association
membership: ADPA is member of AFCAR (Alliance for the Freedom of Car Repair in the EU)
goal: ADPA pursues the purpose to ensure fair access and competitive framework conditions for independent data publishers to automotive data and information to be able to design and provide competitive, innovative and multibrand products and services to operators of the automotive aftermarket to enable competitive choice to motoring consumers and businesses in the care of their vehicles.
interests: Business and Industry, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Institutional affairs, Research and innovation, Single market, Transport
euInitiatives:
- Internal Market (Vehicle and component type approval legislation, Vehicle Repair and Maintenance Information)
- Digital Single Market and Connectivity
- Competition Policy (competition law framework for the automotive aftermarket)
